attributes.action: remind the BBC that it is their job to report news and not speculation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A lot of valuable air-time is wasted on specualtion about strange pre-election rituals in the USA, which in no way affect us or which we can influence. In addition, many reporters are sent to these events at the taxpayers' expense only to give us speculation easily and more cheaply performed in a London studio. Reporting should be about the election and not the manoeverings going on before a preseidential candidate is even elected.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
